resources.string: Failed to play media due to security policy.
To play, permission to read files from the device is required.
Failed to read media from source.
Failed to load media file\nCheck your Internet connection.
Failed to request media decoders from the device.
Failed to load media file\nYour device doesn\'t provide a secure decoder for it.
Failed to load media file\nYour device doesn\'t provide a decoder for it.
Failed to create a decoder for the media file.
